text: The words [strongs id="h1697" /] of Amos [strongs id="h5986" /], who was among the herdmen [strongs id="h5349" /] of Tekoa [strongs id="h8620" /], which he saw [strongs id="h2372" tvm="8804" /] concerning Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of Uzziah [strongs id="h5818" /] king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], and in the days [strongs id="h3117" /] of Jeroboam [strongs id="h3379" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Joash [strongs id="h3101" /] king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], two years [strongs id="h8141" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the earthquake [strongs id="h7494" /].

And he said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /], The LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] will roar [strongs id="h7580" tvm="8799" /] from Zion [strongs id="h6726" /], and utter [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] his voice [strongs id="h6963" /] from Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /]; and the habitations [strongs id="h4999" /] of the shepherds [strongs id="h7462" tvm="8802" /] shall mourn [strongs id="h0056" tvm="8804" /], and the top [strongs id="h7218" /] of Carmel [strongs id="h3760" /] shall wither [strongs id="h3001" tvm="8804" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Damascus [strongs id="h1834" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because they have threshed [strongs id="h1758" tvm="8800" /] Gilead [strongs id="h1568" /] with threshing instruments [strongs id="h2742" /] of iron [strongs id="h1270" /]:

But I will send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] a fire [strongs id="h0784" /] into the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Hazael [strongs id="h2371" /], which shall devour [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8804" /] the palaces [strongs id="h0759" /] of Benhadad [strongs id="h1130" /].

I will break [strongs id="h7665" tvm="8804" /] also the bar [strongs id="h1280" /] of Damascus [strongs id="h1834" /], and cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8689" /] the inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] from the plain [strongs id="h1237" /] of Aven [strongs id="h0206" /], and him that holdeth [strongs id="h8551" tvm="8802" /] the sceptre [strongs id="h7626" /] from the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Eden [strongs id="h5731" tvm="8677" /] [strongs id="h1040" /]: and the people [strongs id="h5971" /] of Syria [strongs id="h0758" /] shall go into captivity [strongs id="h1540" tvm="8804" /] unto Kir [strongs id="h7024" /], saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Gaza [strongs id="h5804" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because they carried away captive [strongs id="h1540" tvm="8687" /] the whole [strongs id="h8003" /] captivity [strongs id="h1546" /], to deliver [them] up [strongs id="h5462" tvm="8687" /] to Edom [strongs id="h0123" /]:

And I will cut off [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8689" /] the inhabitant [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] from Ashdod [strongs id="h0795" /], and him that holdeth [strongs id="h8551" tvm="8802" /] the sceptre [strongs id="h7626" /] from Ashkelon [strongs id="h0831" /], and I will turn [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8689" /] mine hand [strongs id="h3027" /] against Ekron [strongs id="h6138" /]: and the remnant [strongs id="h7611" /] of the Philistines [strongs id="h6430" /] shall perish [strongs id="h0006" tvm="8804" /], saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the Lord [strongs id="h0136" /] GOD [strongs id="h3069" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Tyrus [strongs id="h6865" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because they delivered up [strongs id="h5462" tvm="8687" /] the whole [strongs id="h8003" /] captivity [strongs id="h1546" /] to Edom [strongs id="h0123" /], and remembered [strongs id="h2142" tvm="8804" /] not the brotherly [strongs id="h0251" /] covenant [strongs id="h1285" /]:

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Edom [strongs id="h0123" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because he did pursue [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8800" /] his brother [strongs id="h0251" /] with the sword [strongs id="h2719" /], and did cast off [strongs id="h7843" tvm="8765" /] all pity [strongs id="h7356" /], and his anger [strongs id="h0639" /] did tear [strongs id="h2963" tvm="8799" /] perpetually [strongs id="h5703" /], and he kept [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8804" /] his wrath [strongs id="h5678" /] for ever [strongs id="h5331" /]:

But I will send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] a fire [strongs id="h0784" /] upon Teman [strongs id="h8487" /], which shall devour [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8804" /] the palaces [strongs id="h0759" /] of Bozrah [strongs id="h1224" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Ammon [strongs id="h5983" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because they have ripped up [strongs id="h1234" tvm="8800" /] the women with child [strongs id="h2030" /] of Gilead [strongs id="h1568" /], that they might enlarge [strongs id="h7337" tvm="8687" /] their border [strongs id="h1366" /]:

But I will kindle [strongs id="h3341" tvm="8689" /] a fire [strongs id="h0784" /] in the wall [strongs id="h2346" /] of Rabbah [strongs id="h7237" /], and it shall devour [strongs id="h0398" tvm="8804" /] the palaces [strongs id="h0759" /] thereof, with shouting [strongs id="h8643" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of battle [strongs id="h4421" /], with a tempest [strongs id="h5591" /] in the day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the whirlwind [strongs id="h5492" /]:

And their king [strongs id="h4428" /] shall go [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] into captivity [strongs id="h1473" /], he and his princes [strongs id="h8269" /] together [strongs id="h3162" /], saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Moab [strongs id="h4124" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because he burned [strongs id="h8313" tvm="8800" /] the bones [strongs id="h6106" /] of the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Edom [strongs id="h0123" /] into lime [strongs id="h7875" /]:

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because they have despised [strongs id="h3988" tvm="8800" /] the law [strongs id="h8451" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and have not kept [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8804" /] his commandments [strongs id="h2706" /], and their lies [strongs id="h3577" /] caused them to err [strongs id="h8582" tvm="8686" /], after [strongs id="h0310" /] the which their fathers [strongs id="h0001" /] have walked [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /]:

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; For three [strongs id="h7969" /] transgressions [strongs id="h6588" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], and for four [strongs id="h0702" /], I will not turn away [strongs id="h7725" tvm="8686" /] [the punishment] thereof; because they sold [strongs id="h4376" tvm="8800" /] the righteous [strongs id="h6662" /] for silver [strongs id="h3701" /], and the poor [strongs id="h0034" /] for a pair of shoes [strongs id="h5275" /];

That pant [strongs id="h7602" tvm="8802" /] after the dust [strongs id="h6083" /] of the earth [strongs id="h0776" /] on the head [strongs id="h7218" /] of the poor [strongs id="h1800" /], and turn aside [strongs id="h5186" tvm="8686" /] the way [strongs id="h1870" /] of the meek [strongs id="h6035" /]: and a man [strongs id="h0376" /] and his father [strongs id="h0001" /] will go [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] in unto the [same] maid [strongs id="h5291" /], to profane [strongs id="h2490" tvm="8763" /] my holy [strongs id="h6944" /] name [strongs id="h8034" /]:

And they lay [themselves] down [strongs id="h5186" tvm="8686" /] upon clothes [strongs id="h0899" /] laid to pledge [strongs id="h2254" tvm="8803" /] by [strongs id="h0681" /] every altar [strongs id="h4196" /], and they drink [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8799" /] the wine [strongs id="h3196" /] of the condemned [strongs id="h6064" tvm="8803" /] [in] the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of their god [strongs id="h0430" /].

Yet destroyed [strongs id="h8045" tvm="8689" /] I the Amorite [strongs id="h0567" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] them, whose height [strongs id="h1363" /] [was] like the height [strongs id="h1363" /] of the cedars [strongs id="h0730" /], and he [was] strong [strongs id="h2634" /] as the oaks [strongs id="h0437" /]; yet I destroyed [strongs id="h8045" tvm="8686" /] his fruit [strongs id="h6529" /] from above [strongs id="h4605" /], and his roots [strongs id="h8328" /] from beneath.

Also I brought you up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8689" /] from the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /], and led [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8686" /] you forty [strongs id="h0705" /] years [strongs id="h8141" /] through the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /], to possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8800" /] the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of the Amorite [strongs id="h0567" /].

And I raised up [strongs id="h6965" tvm="8686" /] of your sons [strongs id="h1121" /] for prophets [strongs id="h5030" /], and of your young men [strongs id="h0970" /] for Nazarites [strongs id="h5139" /]. [Is it] not even thus, O ye children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /]? saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

But ye gave the Nazarites [strongs id="h5139" /] wine [strongs id="h3196" /] to drink [strongs id="h8248" tvm="8686" /]; and commanded [strongs id="h6680" tvm="8765" /] the prophets [strongs id="h5030" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], Prophesy [strongs id="h5012" tvm="8735" /] not.

Behold, I am pressed [strongs id="h5781" tvm="8688" /] under you, as a cart [strongs id="h5699" /] is pressed [strongs id="h5781" tvm="8686" /] [that is] full [strongs id="h4392" /] of sheaves [strongs id="h5995" /].

Therefore the flight [strongs id="h4498" /] shall perish [strongs id="h0006" tvm="8804" /] from the swift [strongs id="h7031" /], and the strong [strongs id="h2389" /] shall not strengthen [strongs id="h0553" tvm="8762" /] his force [strongs id="h3581" /], neither shall the mighty [strongs id="h1368" /] deliver [strongs id="h4422" tvm="8762" /] himself [strongs id="h5315" /]:

Neither shall he stand [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8799" /] that handleth [strongs id="h8610" tvm="8802" /] the bow [strongs id="h7198" /]; and [he that is] swift [strongs id="h7031" /] of foot [strongs id="h7272" /] shall not deliver [strongs id="h4422" tvm="8762" /] [himself]: neither shall he that rideth [strongs id="h7392" tvm="8802" /] the horse [strongs id="h5483" /] deliver [strongs id="h4422" tvm="8762" /] himself [strongs id="h5315" /].

And [he that is] courageous [strongs id="h0533" /] [strongs id="h3820" /] among the mighty [strongs id="h1368" /] shall flee away [strongs id="h5127" tvm="8799" /] naked [strongs id="h6174" /] in that day [strongs id="h3117" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /] this word [strongs id="h1697" /] that the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /] against you, O children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], against the whole family [strongs id="h4940" /] which I brought up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8689" /] from the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /],

The lion [strongs id="h0738" /] hath roared [strongs id="h7580" tvm="8804" /], who will not [strongs id="h3808" /] fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /]? the Lord [strongs id="h0136" /] GOD [strongs id="h3069" /] hath spoken [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /], who can but prophesy [strongs id="h5012" tvm="8735" /]?

Publish [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8685" /] in the palaces [strongs id="h0759" /] at Ashdod [strongs id="h0795" /], and in the palaces [strongs id="h0759" /] in the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /], and say [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8798" /], Assemble [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8734" /] yourselves upon the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /] of Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /], and behold [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8798" /] the great [strongs id="h7227" /] tumults [strongs id="h4103" /] in the midst [strongs id="h7130" /] thereof, and the oppressed [strongs id="h6217" /] in the midst [strongs id="h8432" /] thereof.

For they know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] not to do [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] right [strongs id="h5229" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], who store [strongs id="h0686" tvm="8802" /] up violence [strongs id="h2555" /] and robbery [strongs id="h7701" /] in their palaces [strongs id="h0759" /].

Therefore thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the Lord [strongs id="h0136" /] GOD [strongs id="h3069" /]; An adversary [strongs id="h6862" /] [there shall be] even round about [strongs id="h5439" /] the land [strongs id="h0776" /]; and he shall bring down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8689" /] thy strength [strongs id="h5797" /] from thee, and thy palaces [strongs id="h0759" /] shall be spoiled [strongs id="h0962" tvm="8738" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; As the shepherd [strongs id="h7462" tvm="8802" /] taketh out [strongs id="h5337" tvm="8686" /] of the mouth [strongs id="h6310" /] of the lion [strongs id="h0738" /] two [strongs id="h8147" /] legs [strongs id="h3767" /], or a piece [strongs id="h0915" /] of an ear [strongs id="h0241" /]; so shall the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] be taken out [strongs id="h5337" tvm="8735" /] that dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] in Samaria [strongs id="h8111" /] in the corner [strongs id="h6285" /] of a bed [strongs id="h4296" /], and in Damascus [strongs id="h1833" /] [in] a couch [strongs id="h6210" /].

Hear [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8798" /] ye, and testify [strongs id="h5749" tvm="8685" /] in the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Jacob [strongs id="h3290" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the Lord [strongs id="h0136" /] GOD [strongs id="h3069" /], the God [strongs id="h0430" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /],
